charaepi_ch0115_00_denji/2301_1101_0100_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking through
town when [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] heard Volkner shouting nearby.
charaepi_ch0115_00_denji/2301_1201_0200_: Hey, Luxray! Stop trying to pull me away!
charaepi_ch0115_00_denji/2301_1201_0300_:
I just want to look inside! I promise I’ll put it back
the way it was!
charaepi_ch0115_00_denji/2301_0401_0500_:
Oh, hello there. I was just trying to take a look at
this machine, but Luxray stopped me.
charaepi_ch0115_00_denji/2301_0402_0700_:
Unfortunately, no. I just wanted to get a better
look at this machine here.
charaepi_ch0115_00_denji/2301_1201_0800_:
I tried to do something similar back when I first
arrived on Pasio, and one of the scientists here
really gave me an earful.
charaepi_ch0115_00_denji/2301_1201_0900_: I assume that’s why Luxray is trying to stop me.
charaepi_ch0115_00_denji/2301_1201_1000_:
But I’m so interested in the technology they used
to create such an enormous artificial island that I
just can’t help myself.
charaepi_ch0115_00_denji/2301_1201_1100_:
I just want to peek under the hood and see how it
all works. That’s not renovating anything, is it?
charaepi_ch0115_00_denji/2301_1201_1200_: Oh, come on! Of all the times for this to happen!
charaepi_ch0115_00_denji/2301_0401_1400_: I’m in a real pinch, that’s what’s wrong!
charaepi_ch0115_00_denji/2301_1201_1700_:
Our microwave at the cafe broke, and now it’s
taking forever to prep for lunch.
charaepi_ch0115_00_denji/2301_1201_1800_:
You don’t say? Well, it just so happens that I’m
quite good at renova—er, repairs. Maybe I can
be of assistance.
charaepi_ch0115_00_denji/2301_1201_1900_: Really?! Thank you! The cafe is over this way!
charaepi_ch0115_00_denji/2301_1201_2000_:
A job well done.
Oh, hello again, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Were you waiting for me to finish?
charaepi_ch0115_00_denji/2301_0401_2200_:
Of course. It was a shockingly easy fix. One of the
parts had simply gotten knocked loose.
charaepi_ch0115_00_denji/2301_0302_2300_: Did you find out what was broken?
charaepi_ch0115_00_denji/2301_0402_2400_:
Yes. One of the parts had gotten knocked loose,
which was causing the microwave to malfunction.
Shockingly easy fix, really.
charaepi_ch0115_00_denji/2301_1201_2500_:
Luxray has the ability to see through all kinds of
objects, you know. So I was able to see what
needed to be fixed, no problem.
charaepi_ch0115_00_denji/2301_1201_2600_:
It sure would be helpful if he’d use that ability to
help me renovate—uh, I mean, carefully analyze
the machines on Pasio, too.
charaepi_ch0115_00_denji/2301_1201_2700_:
But on the bright side, I’ve been renovating so
many complex machines lately that fixing a simple
kitchen appliance was a nice change of pace.
charaepi_ch0115_00_denji/2301_1201_2800_:
Stuff like that helps me remember why I got into
renovating machines in the first place.
charaepi_ch0115_00_denji/2301_1201_2900_:
It’s good to remember your roots. That’s true even
of Pokémon battles.
charaepi_ch0115_00_denji/2301_1201_3000_:
There was a time when I had nearly forgotten
how to enjoy Pokémon battles.
charaepi_ch0115_00_denji/2301_1201_3100_:
But then I battled this one Trainer, and it was like
I could suddenly remember why I enjoyed them
so much.
charaepi_ch0115_00_denji/2301_1201_3200_:
After that, I decided I wanted the Trainers I face
to enjoy Pokémon battles just as much as I do.
charaepi_ch0115_00_denji/2301_1201_3300_: I think Luxray really enjoys battles, too.
charaepi_ch0115_00_denji/2301_1201_3400_:
No matter how tired or sleepy he is, when it’s
time to battle, it’s like a switch flips on inside him.
charaepi_ch0115_00_denji/2301_1201_3500_:
The two of us will never stop having fun,
shocking battles!
